title: ActiveMQ to Lambda
description: Establish an ActiveMQ Broker and configure a Lambda function with ActiveMQ as its event source

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This template deploys a new ActiveMQ Broker and uses it as an event source for AWS Lambda. The Lambda function employs the OpenWire protocol to establish a connection with ActiveMQ.
Lambda uses Openwire protocol to connect with ActiveMQ

bullets.text: Using Amazon MQ as an event source for AWS Lambda

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Thanit Youruchatangern
authors.bio: I am a Technical Account Manager at AWS based in Thailand. I help customer solving complex problems with simple solutions.
